text: Mary Kuivenhoven (born circa 1952) is a Dutch Paralympic swimmer from Soest. She competed at the1972 Summer Paralympics, winning a gold medal as part of the 4x 100 metres relay team, and individually two silver medals and a bronze medal. She worked as a shop assistant. == References == Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the Netherlands Category:1952 births Category:Living people
title: Mary Kuivenhoven
